docna.cdata!:
Kenya - Third Industrial Development : Loan
            1438 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Kenya - Third Industrial
            Development : Loan 1438 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

repnme.cdata!: Kenya - Third Industrial Development Bank Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The purpose of the Third Industrial
            Development Bank Project is to assist the Industrial
            Development Bank (IDB) in implementing investment programs,
            as well as Kenya's industrial development. More
            specifically, the project will enable IDB: (a) to provide
            term financing on suitable terms to medium- and large-scale
            manufacturing projects in Kenya that have been
            well-conceived on economic, financial, and technical
            grounds; and (b) to maintain and increase the momentum
            generated to date in establishing IDB as a major industrial
            development finance institution and to enhance its ability
            to carry out its future activities in the framework of
            Kenya's evolving industrial strategy.

docna.cdata!: Kenya - Third Industrial Development Bank Project

display_title.display_title:
Kenya - Third Industrial
            Development Bank Project
